name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: The MacBook Air M2 features Apple's latest M2 chip, offering faster performance and longer battery life in a sleek design.

name: Dell XPS 13 (2023)
description: The Dell XPS 13 (2023) is a compact laptop with an InfinityEdge display and powerful Intel processors.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i
description: The Lenovo Yoga 9i is a premium 2-in-1 laptop with a stunning OLED display and versatile design.

name: HP Envy x360
description: The HP Envy x360 is a flexible laptop with powerful performance and an attractive design.

name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 Pro features advanced camera capabilities and the A16 Bionic chip for exceptional performance.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: The Galaxy S23 Ultra boasts a stunning display, top-tier camera, and S Pen support for ultimate productivity.

name: Google Pixel 7 Pro
description: The Pixel 7 Pro features an AI-powered camera and seamless integration with Google services.

name: OnePlus 11
description: The OnePlus 11 delivers flagship performance with a high refresh rate display and impressive camera capabilities.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 offers industry-leading noise cancellation and premium sound quality.

name: Apple AirPods Max
description: AirPods Max provide an immersive audio experience with Active Noise Cancellation and spatial audio support.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
description: The Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones deliver exceptional comfort and high-quality sound with effective noise cancellation.

name: Jabra Elite 85t
description: The Jabra Elite 85t earbuds provide customizable noise cancellation and superior sound quality.

name: Apple Watch Series 8
description: The Apple Watch Series 8 features advanced health tracking, fitness features, and a stunning display.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
description: The Galaxy Watch 5 offers fitness tracking and smart features in a sleek, stylish design.

name: Oculus Quest 2
description: The Oculus Quest 2 is a standalone VR headset with a wide range of games and experiences.

name: GoPro HERO10 Black
description: The HERO10 Black is an action camera that captures stunning 5.3K video and 23MP photos.

name: Amazon Echo Show 10
description: The Echo Show 10 features a 10-inch HD screen and Alexa integration for smart home control.

name: Nest Learning Thermostat
description: The Nest Learning Thermostat helps save energy by learning your schedule and adjusting temperatures automatically.

name: Kindle Oasis
description: The Kindle Oasis is an advanced e-reader with an adjustable warm light and ergonomic design.

name: SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD
description: The SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD offers high-speed storage in a durable, compact design.

name: TP-Link Deco X20 WiFi 6
description: The Deco X20 provides fast and reliable WiFi 6 coverage throughout your home.

name: Razer Kraken X Lite
description: The Razer Kraken X Lite is a lightweight gaming headset with immersive sound and comfort.

name: Logitech G502 HERO
description: The G502 HERO is a customizable gaming mouse with advanced features for serious gamers.

name: Belkin MagSafe Charger
description: The Belkin MagSafe Charger provides fast and efficient wireless charging for compatible devices.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800mAh
description: The Anker PowerCore 26800mAh is a high-capacity portable charger for multiple devices.

name: JBL Charge 5
description: The JBL Charge 5 is a portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound and long battery life.
